SEARCH
Package controller

Class ApplicantController

java.lang.Object
controller.UserController
controller.ApplicantController
public class ApplicantController extends UserController
Handles command-line interactions for users logged in as Applicants. It controls actions like viewing projects, checking eligibility, submitting applications, managing enquiries, and changing passwords by delegating tasks to the ApplicantService.
